attributes.action: United Kingdom to welcome President Donald Trump to the State Visit .
attributes.additional_details:
We welcome President Donald J Trump as the honourable President of the United States of America to meet with Heir Royal Highness Queen Elizabeth ii on the upcoming State Visit .

We as proud British have welcomed every other President in History to visit our waters .
The above visit should go ahead as planned , there is no lawful reason or standing as to why it should be postponed or stopped .

We have a long standing great friendship with the United States Of America and pray it will continue for both our futures .
attributes.background: We welcome President Donald J Trump as the honourable President of the United States of America .
